text: hi, you should really consider donating to Save the Children
What exactly does Save the Children do with the money?
They use the money for promoting children's rights and supporting their life needs in developing countries
Ok, do you know which countries they help out?
Bangladesh, Bhutan, China, Fiji , India, Indonesia , Japan, Myanmar, Nepal, Philippines, Thailand, Vanuatu, Vietnam
Wow, that's impressive. Do you guys help our refugee kids from war zones?
yes we do
Thank you. Is there a minimum on how much I have to donate?
no, there is no minimum. you can donate some or all of your incoming payment for the task. every little bit helps.
What if I am still reluctant and want proof if this is a real charity?
you are welcome to google it. however, I can give you more statistical information would that help?
Yes please, that would help.
For more than 30 years, Save the Children has been on the ground in Asia helping children Â¡Âª every day, and in times of crisis. In 2016, we helped nearly 17.5 million children in need.
Ok, I am convinced. How can I donate?
wonderful! I am so happy to hear that. the donation will come out of your task payment at whatever amount you feel is right.
Ok, what type of payments do you accept?
it it simply deducted from your task payment, whatever you choose. how much are you wanting to donate?
I'd like to donate 50 dollars from my Paypal, will that work?
for right now. I am offering a donation that comes out of your task payment. However, you can donate the remaining amount that you want on their website at  URL
Oh, I thought we were role-playing? In that case, I'd like to donate 0 dollars please.
